name: Hip Hop Berserker
description:
Swipe/Tap to awesome Hip Hop beats in this incredibly fun rhythm/action-adventure game.

REVIEWS:

AppAddict - "It's rhythm gameplay is fun, it looks great, sounds superb, and even has a sliver of a narrative to round off the package." - **** Stars

Swipe JP - "In the first few minutes of playing, I was immersed in the memories of Nujabes."

Gameazilla - "Great graphics...cartoonish characters...But the actual joy will come from jumping, ducking, slashing, and unleashing a sword attack while listening to...great hip-hop music."

Join Saro, a young “Berserker” and Carter, a magical, sword transforming, beat producing goblin as they go on an epic journey to rescue the goddess Hip Hop from the evil wizard Hu Man Dong. Use the power of Hip Hop to defeat hordes of powerful evil minions and become the ultimate Hip Hop Berserker!

JUMP, DUCK, SHURIKEN-THROW, and SLASH to the music of Kyo Itachi, Brock Berrigan, and DeStorm Power! New musical tracks from various Hip Hop producers featured EVERY month!
 **************************************
 Hip Hop Berserker Features:

14 Awesome Head-Nodding Hip Hop Tracks!

• Featuring great indie Hip Hop producers: Kyo Itachi, Brock Berrigan, and DeStorm Power! More coming soon!

Hilarious Animated Cutscenes!
• Created by and featuring the voice talent of indie animator, E.A. Gray (Kung Fu Kintae)!

20 Levels, Three Difficulties!
• Easy. Normal. Berserker! Can you beat all three?!
 Slow Down Time with BERSERKER MODE!
• Enter Berserker Mode and watch as you slowly crush your opponents!

Play As DESTORM POWER!
• YouTube Personality (over 1.5 million subscribers), musician, comedian, and finally...Hip Hop Berserker (Bonus levels only)!

Gorgeous Visuals!
• Ten beautifully detailed environments and cartoonishly detailed characters!

Game Center Achievements, Leaderboards, and Treasure!
• See how you rank level by level versus other players. Earn various achievements and unlock the powerful Golden Berserker Outfit!
